extracted_playbook.title: Update UNEM R16B PC2 and earlier
extracted_playbook.description: Update to UNEM R16B PC3 or later and apply general mitigation factors.

extracted_playbook.title: Update UNEM R15B PC4 or prior
extracted_playbook.description: Update to UNEM R15B PC5 and apply general mitigation factors.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply General Mitigation Factors for EOL Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Apply general mitigation factors for UNEM R16A and UNEM R15A as no fix will be available. Users with UNEM R16A are entitled to update to UNEM R16B.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Recommended Security Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended security practices and firewall configurations to protect the process control network from external attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Physically Protect Process Control Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure process control systems are physically protected from unauthorized access and have no direct Internet connections.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Portable Devices for Viruses
extracted_playbook.description: Carefully scan portable computers and removable storage media for viruses before connecting them to a control system.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
